data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 1,714 believers in the state of Fez Meknes into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fez Meknes, Morocco
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,714 believers in the state of Fez Meknes.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,714 believers in Fez Meknes and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Fez Meknes, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Berber, Uregu people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 1,714 believers in Fez Meknes to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,633,286 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Fez Meknes, Morocco will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Fez Meknes, Morocco has a population of 1,635,000.

We estimate Fez Meknes has 1,714 people who might know Jesus, 1,372 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,631,914 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 953 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Fez Meknes, Morocco.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
